item.description:
Time to ski and Ride at Wachusett.

We gather at the Coppertop Lounge between 6:30 and 7:00 and then ski until they kick us out at 10 PM. Some of us participate in the NASTAR Ski Racing - which requires us to do 2 runs on the Challenger Race Course - but then we keep skiing all evening. Around 9 we will head for the Black Diamond Restaurant for a bite to eat and collect racing pins.

It is highly recommended you get a Bronze Pass from Wachusett to ski 5 days (m-f) and 7 nights a week. Pays for itself very quickly. Or pay for a lift ticket when you arrive!

Please let me know if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Will be at the Coppertop Lounge between 6:30 and 7:00
item.name: Wachusett Wednesdays
